entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -19.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
